title: 070 Open Google Play Store Listing for your app
The following code snippet shows how to open the Google Play Store Listing of your app in a safe way. Usually you want to use it when asking the user to leave a review for your app.

inline_content.Text: The following code snippet shows how to open the Google Play Store Listing of your app in a safe way. Usually you want to use it when asking the user to leave a review for your app.

title: Note
b
: The code opens the Google Play Store if the app is installed. Otherwise it will just open the web browser.

inline_content.Text: : The code opens the Google Play Store if the app is installed. Otherwise it will just open the web browser.
